Operations Command Center

[!SUMMARY] Everything you need to keep AdvisorOS healthy in production: incidents, deployments, compliance, and observability playbooks.

Quick Actions

  • Review the Operations Runbook before every on-call shift.
  • Confirm change windows against the Production Deployment Guide.
  • Keep the Production Readiness Checklist handy for every release.
  • Bookmark the Incident Response Playbook for midnight triage.

Incident Workflow 

graph LR
  Detect[Detection]
  Triage[Triage]
  Mitigate[Mitigation]
  Restore[Restore]
  Review[Post-Incident Review]

  Detect --> Triage
  Triage --> Mitigate
  Mitigate --> Restore
  Restore --> Review
  Review --> Detect

Each stage maps directly to the procedures inside the Incident Response Playbook.

Change Calendar

Change Type Cadence Owner Reference
Feature deployments Weekly Release Captain Production Deployment Guide
Infrastructure patches Bi-weekly Platform Engineering Administrator Guide
Security drills Quarterly Security Officer Security Compliance Report
Backup validation Monthly Database Lead Database Reference

Playbooks

  • Incident Response Playbook
  • Operations Runbook
  • Production Deployment Guide
  • Compliance Oversight
  • Database Recovery Checklist
  • Post-Launch Support Optimization

Reporting Rhythm

  1. Publish weekly health summaries in Slack using data from Feature Success dashboards.
  2. Run monthly compliance reviews referencing COMPREHENSIVE_SECURITY_AUDIT_REPORT.md.
  3. Share quarterly automation gains and client impact from CLIENT_SUCCESS_SYSTEM.md.

Table of contents

  • Operations Runbook
  • Production Deployment Guide
